page.title: 10Housing in Brompton on Swale
page.content: Most of the houses in Brompton are built of brick but some of the old ones are stone. Usually these are two- storied but there are some bungalows for old people. Most houses have central heating and a lot of them have open fires. There are about two to four bedrooms in the houses and the older houses are a bit bigger than the new ones. The new houses mostly have garages but the old ones only have drives. Most houses have gardens, some of them are quite big. The older houses are along the main road in the village but the newer houses are in 5 estates. There are more houses being built near the school and the village is getting bigger. There are a lot of council houses in Colburn but not many in Brompton.
